content: I agree. It's heartening to see cities and organizations taking creative approaches to address gentrification, and it's my hope that more will follow their lead in the years ahead. By working collaboratively and adopting inclusive and equitable strategies, we can create urban areas that are vibrant, diverse, and accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or income level. We just need to continue to stay engaged and committed to the cause, and keep pushing for positive change in our communities.
